misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni, a distinguished competitor from Hirsala Golf, has been a constant presence at the Hector Trophée since its inception. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Toni's dedication extends beyond the green; he is the primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event, ensuring its smooth execution year after year.

With 11 past appearances, Toni's experience is undeniable. A three-time winner of the Hector Trophée and a two-time Victor Trophy recipient, Toni has proven to be a formidable force, combining skill and strategy to outmaneuver his opponents.

As he prepares for his 12th appearance in Hector Trophée 2025, Toni remains a player to watch. His commitment to the sport and his intimate knowledge of the tournament make him a perennial contender, admired both on and off the course.
